{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=SURFboard mAX |revision=Pro (W31) |series=AX11000 |serialnum_prefix=WR00ZAE31TB |asin=B07M8TZ1KM, B07M8M7FG9, |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=DareGlobal |type=wireless router, wireless system |fcc_date=07/26/2018 |fcc_id=UIDW31 |pcb_id=ARCT05381 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG, TK1735, 4AT-16 Z2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F4G08ABAEA |fla2_brand=Micron |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16TW-107:P |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1743 P11, X1S-01 N2 W; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1743 P11, X1S-01 N2 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1743 P11, X1S-01 N2 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4GHz FEM;Skyworks;SKY85331-11;85331-11, 124578.1, 1725 MX;4; ,,, 5GHz FEM;Skyworks;SKY85743-11;85743, 62476, 1733 MX;8; ,,, Bluetooth 5.0 SoC;Cypress;CYW20719;CYW20719, 2TKUMLG, 1731 DA15, CYP633272, TWN C;1; |flags=Wi-Fi 6, 256QAM, Bluetooth 5.0, LACP, Link Aggregation, DFS (slave), DFS (slave), Zero Wait DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax }} {{TagLine|SURFboard mAX AX11000 Whole-Home Wi-Fi Router}} :[https://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/max-mesh-wi-fi-system/ax11000/ Product page] (''SURFboard mAX Pro Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System'') *P/N: WR00ZAE31TB "WAVE RUNNER 11AX [MAIN BOARD]", "PWB:ARCT05381 RevB", and :"30-NOV-2017" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The difference is the W31 has a matte black colored bottom while the W30's bottom is silver. :A variant called W30 is mentioned with the C2PC request documents at the FCC. *[http://productspec.ul.com/document.php?id=NWGQ.E214476 ''Arris SURFboard'' on '''UL Product Spec'''] :The tagline comes from [http://productspec.ul.com/document.php?id=NWGQ.E214476 this] list of UL Certified products from ''[[Arris]]'' :The 2.4GHz radio doubles as a receive-only 1x1:1 5GHz radio. *[https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers ''List of WiFi 6 Routers'' on '''24|Wireless'''] • [https://24wireless.info/wifi6-router-compare Compare] (JP) :;Models 
	SURFboard mAX Pro	SURFboard mAX Pro	SURFboard mAX Plus	SURFboard mAX Plus
	Mesh Wi-Fi System	Mesh Wi-Fi Router	Mesh Wi-Fi System	Mesh Wi-Fi Router
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Wi-Fi Speed:	AX11000		AX11000			AX7800			AX7800
Wi-Fi Stream:	12 stream	12 stream		8 stream		8 stream
Wi-Fi Bands:	4x4 2.4/5GHz	4x4 2.4/5GHz		2x2 2.4/5GHz		2x2 2.4/5GHz
Wi-Fi Bands:	4x4 5GHz (BH)	4x4 5GHz (BH)		4x4 5GHz (BH)		4x4 5GHz (BH)
Backhaul (BH):	4x4 (4.8Gbps)	4x4 (4.8Gbps)		4x4 (4.8Gbps)		4x4 (4.8Gbps)
Wi-Fi Coverage:	6,000 sf	3,000 sf		6,000 sf		3,000 sf
GbE Ports:	8 (2x 4)	4			8 (2x 4)		4
Routers (pack):	2		1			2			1
===See also=== :;[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[Arris SURFboard mAX Pro (W31)]] (AX11000) • [https://www.amazon.com/ARRIS-Surfboard-Pro-AX11000-W31/dp/B07M8TZ1KM/ B07M8TZ1KM] :[https://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/max-mesh-wi-fi-system/ax11000/ AX11000 SURFboard mAX Pro Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System] (W133) *[[Arris SURFboard mAX Plus (W130)]] (AX7800) • [https://www.amazon.com/ARRIS-Surfboard-Plus-AX7800-Router/dp/B07MD414J4/ B07MD414J4] :[https://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/max-mesh-wi-fi-system/ax7800/ AX7800 SURFboard mAX Plus Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System] *[[Arris SURFboard mAX]] (AX6600) • [https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers 24W] • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/15369/arris-expands-wifi-6-portfolio-with-ax6600-surfboard-max-mesh-system AT] :[https://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/max-mesh-wi-fi-system/ax6600/ AX6600 SURFboard mAX Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System] *[[Arris SBR-AC3200P]] - SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent *[[Arris SBR-AC1900P]] - SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent *[[Arris SBR-AC1200P]] - SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent *[[Arris SBX-AC1200P]] - SURFboard Wi-Fi Hotspot with RipCurrent *[[Arris SBX-1000P]] - SURFboard Wired Network Extender with RipCurrent __NOTOC__
